system.description: You give a tremendous shout. Creatures in a 15-foot cone take 5d6 points of sonic damage and are deafened for 2d6 rounds. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the deafness. Nonmagical objects in the area can be damaged or destroyed.
system.savingThrow: Fortitude half or Reflex negates (object); see text
